pages.text: As is known, at the heart of all ritual circles drawn by traditional methods lies the core - a special small circle of two colors, one of which characterizes the guiding force of the circles according to the peculiarities of the ritual, and the other is invariably golden, surrounding any other color. Special kits are used for drawing the core of circles, described below.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Any drawing kit for the core of a ritual circle consists of a simple mixture of chalk (two colors, one always golden) and a pair of candles of any color. The other kits are presented on the following pages.

pages.title: Circle Cores
pages.text: The images depict the appearance of the cores of different colours.
